What can I say about these excellent 2-hour (less without the commercials) starring the Best of many underrated actors playing the very difficult role of America's favorite attorney, Perry Mason.  Burr once said on the Charlie Rose show that these gave the writers more time to lay out the plat as well as for the courtroom scenes as not so many corners were cut.  There are 24 of these features and, I am hoping the the 3-4 that were made during Burr's final days and after his death have been omitted.  At least, I hope so.

Excellent purchase. If you are a Perry Mason fan, this is a must for your collection. It is cheaper to buy the 12 Double Feature sets than to buy the larger 6 movie sets. And the Double Feature sets are in order of when the movies were shown. I will be watching these over and over.
High quality as always expected from the Perry Mason body of work.
I liked them very much
